column.name: [ra]
column.summary: RA J2000 of MIPS 24 micron source

column.name: [dec]
column.summary: Dec J2000 of MIPS 24 micron source

column.name: [ra_irac]
column.summary: RA J2000 of IRAC prior source (-1 if no prior)

column.name: [dec_irac]
column.summary: Dec J2000 of IRAC prior source (-1 if no prior)

column.name: [s_24]
column.summary: Flux density of MIPS 24 micron source

column.name: [s_24_err]
column.summary: Undertainty in flux density of MIPS 24 micron source

column.name: [irac_tag]
column.summary: Set to 1 if there is IRAC coverage

column.name: [extended_tag]
column.summary: Set to 1 if source is extended at 24 microns
